definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇנוּב]] Ps 62:11, Pr 10:31; [[יְנוּבוּן]] Ps 92:15; —only fig., abs. of righteous under fig. of tree Ps 92:15; [[חַיִל כִּי יׇנוּב]] Ps 62:11 if wealth beareth fruit; Pr 10:31 [[פִּי חַדִּיק יׇנוּב חָכְמָה]] beareth the fruit of  wisdom.

definitions.title: Poï1.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְנוֹבֵב]] Zec 9:17, [[דָּגׇן]] [[בְּתֻלוֹת]] ´[[בַּחוּרִים וְתִירוֹשׁ יְנ]] fig. for makes flourish.
